.. -*- rst -*-

Audit Trail API
===============

The APIs to manage batch creation of :guilabel:`Audit Trail` entries and search operations can be found
in the class `cs.audittrail.AuditTrailApi`.


.. autoclass:: cs.audittrail.AuditTrailApi
   :members: createAuditTrails,
             createAuditTrailsWithDetails,
             getChangedObjectIDs,
             getChangedObjects
